Summary: light in sky not resembling aircraft
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Libertyville
There were no other sightings in Libertyville on or around May 28th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was at about 11:30 at night i was texting my friend and i looked at my phone it was being reflected so i could see out the window and i saw a light it was about 1000-2500 feet in the air so at first i thought it was just a plane but i never thought planes were that low and it was silent it was hovering and took off i do not think thats its an airplane or not a balloon or a helicopter other than this i havent told anybody else about this i heard about MUFON on UFO hunters. It hovered and did some small movements but that was it. like from one place to another place 3-10 feet away. I was alrght with the object i was a little scared if it crashes.
